data.name: The Tale of Bistun - Artbook
data.detailed_description:
Contest:
  • Character Art
  • Environment master shots
  • Color key
  • Level art
  • Assets architecture
  • 43 pages total

Digital Artbook by:
Navid Shadrokh - concept art
Amin Shahidi - animator
Mohammand Najafi - 3D characters
Ahmadreza Khaksari - 3D environment & concept art
Soroush Abasian - VFX & UI
Omid Azhir - Additional 3D characters
Mahyar Charejoo - Promotional art
